body.text: the log text that describes the problem for the user or system admin
body.trace: the technical trace back description for debugging
body.prg_part: name of the function that has caused the exception

body.text: the log 2 text that describes the problem for the user or system admin
body.trace: the technical trace 2 back description for debugging
body.prg_part: name 2 of the function that has caused the exception
